moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Smelling Salts
moves.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target's paralysis, however.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.
